content: अभिहित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} ({%a%}) Said, declared, spoken, mentioned; मयाभिहितं, तेनाभिहितं &c. ({%b%}) Predicated, asserted; अनभिहिते कर्मणि द्वितीया <ls>P. II. 3. 1-2</ls>. ({%c%}) Spoken to, addressed, called, named. ({%d%}) Whispered, prompted to say; determined. {@--2@} Fastened, placed upon. --तं A name, expression, word; °त्वं being said or spoken to, a declaration; authority, test.
